items.content_html: Switched up to the sw smart card for trains over Trainline app as there are suggested savings aka no booking fees. Using uber for my football trains now too as gain credits. I am trying to get money savvy for 2025. Will I miss trainline app end of year review maybe ğŸ¤” ğŸ˜‚
